tool_description: Optimizes robot trajectories using specified optimization objectives like minimum time, energy, or smoothness with constraint handling.

initial_trajectory.description: Initial trajectory as flattened joint positions

num_joints.description: Number of joints per trajectory point

optimization_objective.description: Optimization goal: minimum_time, minimum_energy, maximum_smoothness, minimum_jerk

velocity_limits.description: Maximum velocity limits for each joint

acceleration_limits.description: Maximum acceleration limits for each joint

waypoint_flexibility.description: Allowed deviation from original waypoints (0.0 to 1.0)

error_messages: Invalid trajectory format: initial_trajectory length must be divisible by num_joints.
Unsupported objective: Use minimum_time, minimum_energy, maximum_smoothness, or minimum_jerk.
Limit mismatch: joint_limits_min and joint_limits_max must each have num_joints elements.
Invalid iteration count: max_iterations must be between 10 and 1000.
Invalid tolerance: convergence_tolerance must be between 1e-6 and 0.1.
Invalid flexibility: waypoint_flexibility must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
usage: Provide initial_trajectory, num_joints, optimization_objective, joint limits, and optional constraints. Returns optimized trajectory with performance metrics.

optimized_trajectory.description: Optimized trajectory as flattened joint positions

improvement_ratio.description: Improvement ratio compared to initial trajectory
